Text: "There's nothing in this agent. You might want to get your eyes checked."
"...You're not serious about this one, are you?"
"You might want to take a look at these one more time."
"Check your findings before you send them off, please..."
"Good work, you're on the right track."
"Great find! We'll get back to you as soon as we can."
"This is plenty of evidence. We can make a good case out of this. Good work, I'll email you with the findings."
"Thanks. We'll take a look into it. We'll e-mail you with the results."
"Alright, we'll see if they raise any red flags and get back to you."
